name: GBA MMO
description:
This is GBA-MMO (a better name TBD), the world's first MMORPG for the GameBoy Advance. With the help of a Raspberry Pi (and in the future a specialized wireless adapter) the GameBoy Advance is brought to the age of the internet, and you're able to play online alongside other players from across the globe.

Developed for GBA Jam 2021, you'll be able to explore the (admittedly small) world around you, train various skills, and complete a quest or two.

This game is Open Source (GPLv3), and contributions are welcome! The code can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/maciel310

Have questions, or want to chat about the game? Join the discord: https://discord.gg/B3wJYnUswN
